LanguageData.ActivatorCountdown.label: count-down activator
LanguageData.ActivatorCountdown.description: A timed mechanoid activation unit. After counting down, it will wake nearby dormant mechanoids and structures.
LanguageData.ActivatorProximity.label: proximity activator
LanguageData.ActivatorProximity.description: A proximity alarm for dormant mechanoids. If it detects a human-like threat nearby, it will awaken any nearby dormant mechanoids or structures.
